summary: No 24h cooldown for the Dragon Aspect shout.
descriptionHtml:
This tiny little .esp will remove the power cooldown for the Dragon Aspect shout. 
It can be considered cheating, but I made this file, because I barely use the shout anyway. But if I do it, I\'ll not wait 24 hours before I can make cool screenshots again. 

Look at the screenshot for specific infortmation.

The mod is confirmed to be free of bugs, but go ahead and tell me if you run into some issues.

NEEDS DRAGONBORN DLC!
- Captain Obvious
author: me
